    GriffonArtifact, GriffonMvcArtifact, GriffonView, MVCHandler, ResourceHandler, ThreadingHandler

    public abstract class AbstractLanternaGriffonView
extends AbstractGriffonView
    Lanterna-friendly implementation of the GriffonView interface.

    2.0.0
    Author:
    Andres Almiray
